      1) Deletes the temporary file if it is exists in the temp directory 1.1) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = true returns ModelAndView with redirecting to "/error" page with the localized message for a User and the full stack trace as the Model attribute "debugMessage" and the given HttpStatus. 1.2) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = false returns ModelAndView with redirecting to "/trimmer" page with just the localized message for User and the given HttpStatus

      • returnPageWithError

        org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView returnPageWithError​(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus,
                                                                 java.lang.String localizedErrorMessage,
                                                                 java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                                                                 java.util.Locale locale)
        1) Deletes the temporary file if it is exists in the temp directory 1.1) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = true returns ModelAndView with redirecting to "/error" page with the localized message for a User and the full stack trace as the Model attribute "debugMessage" and the given HttpStatus. 1.2) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = false returns ModelAndView with redirecting to "/trimmer" page with just the localized message for User and the given HttpStatus
        Parameters:
        httpStatus - To be returned to a User page
        localizedErrorMessage - Prepared and localized message to be returned to a User as the "userMessage" attribute
        throwable - To be logged here
        locale - To send a possible localized message to the end User from this method.
